reviews.comment: Absolutely Outstanding! Neat delivered amazing service. They were always on time, professional, and the finished product is stunning. Our new counters and bathrooms look wonderful. Highly recommend!
reviews.name: accounts/110910939982189858227/locations/4184322016834380586/reviews/AbFvOqnk6n4V6vHEGXwHMm4W1OTZZ2sILoF0WCydkLFyZ7HxK-hURIg4zA5Zdz9jDo2kDrLk-ustvA

reviews.comment: We recently bought 100 yr old multi family home. It needed total renovation. The team at Neat services listened to all of our concerns and over delivered!! They always showed up on time and completed each project in full. We did kitchen, bathroom, stairwell and painted entire home. I would highly recommended this company.
reviews.name: accounts/110910939982189858227/locations/4184322016834380586/reviews/AbFvOqkQkLcAWqgNWDH6vo6JUqxpmKHmIk8QMOGwJ4oybRYU3WdOmhOZsLoYBtJoA0FU8zfDTC6Www

reviews.comment:
I had several excellent experience with Neat Services! From start to finish, their professionalism, attention to detail, and commitment to quality really stood out. The team is punctual, friendly, and thorough, making sure everything is left "NEAT"!

I've used Neat Services for several years now and friends that I've referred them to, keep calling them time and time again also.

They've done all sorts of works, from completely renewing and apartment, sidewalk, patio work, to minor stuff, like painting.

I've come to trust their owner and team members tremendously. While overseas due to a leak from the roof my kitchen ceiling collapse and a friend that stopped by to water the plants realized. I contacted Diego and he was there the next day assessing the damages and what had to be done. Neat services provided me with the peace of mind to enjoy the rest of my family's vacation. When we arrived, we found a spotless kitchen like if nothing ever happened. That's the level of trust I have on Neat Services, to allow them to go into my HOME, unattended, unsupervised.  They go above and beyond—working efficiently without cutting corners, and leaving everything looking fresh, organized, and truly “neat.”

I can't leave a review without mentioning Camilo, their site supervisor. A man of many hats. Camilo is very knowledgeable and is able/willing to explain and go every detail, providing pros and cons of several options one might be contemplating. The whole team is great!

If you’re looking for a reliable, trustworthy, and detail-oriented service in New York, I highly recommend Neat Services. They’ve definitely earned my repeat business!

reviewReply.comment:
Mr. Carlos, 
Thank you so much for your beautiful words. It truly means a lot to us that you’ve trusted Neat Services for so many years, and especially that you feel confident enough to let us care for your home, even while away. We’re grateful for clients like you who become part of our extended family. Diego, Camilo, and the entire team are smiling reading this. Thank you again for your continued trust and support, it’s what keeps us doing what we love.

The Neat team.

reviewReply.comment: Thank you so much for your kind words! We’re thrilled to hear you were happy with the painting, and flooring work, and especially that the attention to detail made a difference. Diego and the team always go the extra mile, and it means a lot to know it brought you peace of mind. We truly appreciate the opportunity to work in your home. reviews.comment: I reached out to Neat to do a framing project on an apartment I'm renovating. They arrived on the site early and worked non-stop till the afternoon when the project was done. They were transparent with what they were doing and why, they were open to my requests for modifications, and troubleshot some problems we had to my satisfaction. Great, professional service at a reasonable price. Highly recommended.

reviewReply.comment:
Thank you so much for your kind words and thoughtful feedback!

It was a pleasure working with you on your renovation project. We’re so glad to hear you felt supported throughout the process and that our team could deliver the transparency, flexibility, and professionalism you were looking for.

Your satisfaction means everything to us, and we truly appreciate the opportunity to be part of your project. Don’t hesitate to reach out if you ever need anything in the future — we’re always here to help.

Warm regards,
The Neat Services Inc. Team

reviews.comment: We worked with Diego to completely upgrade and change the look of our house. They did an AMAZING  job and we love the final look!  At a very fair price (the best you will find) Diego was fantastic to work with. They installed 15 windows, a sliding glass door and a skylight, redid the siding of the entire house, and did all of the finishing/detail work - custom completed on the house. They also put a new roof and a skylight on my studio behind the house. Diego was extremely professional,  - understood exactly what we wanted, added his wealth of knowledge to make sure it was done right-  and the whole time treated our project like it was his- he took full responsibility to get it right. He is very responsive to all questions and texts and he is truly delightful to work with, a kind and thoughtful person. I HIGHLY recommend hiring Diego and NEAT services, they transformed our home and we couldn’t be happier!

reviewReply.comment:
Thank you so much for your beautiful words. It truly means the world to us—and especially to Diego. He put his heart into your project, and hearing how happy you are makes it all worth it. You were a pleasure to work with from start to finish. Thank you for your trust, your kindness, and for letting us be a part of your home’s transformation. We're so grateful.

Neat Services Team

reviews.name: accounts/110910939982189858227/locations/4184322016834380586/reviews/AbFvOqmdKfaRotPlYLbzCH8BluwoFcmhG_VfWdj1TGoCzIgxXu-eZbKVoqRuRKtifPnrIVrY7rUWyA

reviews.comment:
We recently had the pleasure of working with Neat Services on a full bathroom remodel, and we couldn’t be happier with the results. From day one, their team was not only professional and skilled but also incredibly thoughtful and thorough. They took the time to walk us through every step of the process, explaining our options clearly and helping us make informed decisions that worked within our budget and fit our family’s needs.

As with many remodels, once they started the work, we uncovered several unexpected structural issues. Neat Services handled each one with ease and transparency, offering practical solutions and keeping us updated every step of the way. Their attention to detail and commitment to doing the job right really stood out. And when the work was done, they left the space absolutely spotless — it was like walking into a brand-new spa-like bathroom.

One of the things we appreciated most was their thoughtful follow-up even after the project was complete. They checked in to make sure everything was still working well and that we were fully satisfied. That level of care is rare.

We were so impressed by the experience that we immediately hired them again — this time to remodel our kitchen and help us add a laundry room. Safe to say, we trust them completely. If you’re looking for a team that’s reliable, communicative, and genuinely invested in their work, Neat Services is it.

reviewReply.comment:
Reading this made our day—thank you. 

Our crew remembers every surprise we uncovered behind those walls, and hearing that our solutions and clean-up hit the mark means a lot. We try to treat each home like our own, so your words about feeling guided and cared for really resonate.

We’re honored you asked us back for the kitchen and laundry room, and we’ll bring the same transparency and care to that project.

reviews.name: accounts/110910939982189858227/locations/4184322016834380586/reviews/AbFvOqlJPmzDb0JU0kac1S0nwA1DgQaIS1ClJCGAZ2CwvTC4Razh0-EdfOX9mL-dePDjXoC2fTwQ

reviews.comment: I could write a novel about my incredible experience with this team and how happy I am! They went above and beyond in every aspect possible and the work is absolutely perfect. We renovated our basement, bathroom, kitchen and more and they handled every detail with precision and care. They treated our home like it was their own. I can’t wait to have them do some exterior work in the future, we’ll be using them for everything! Can’t recommend them enough.

reviewReply.comment:
Reading this put a huge smile on our faces—thank you! Renovating a basement, bathroom, and kitchen all at once is a big leap of faith, and we’re honored you trusted us with every inch of it. Our crew really does treat each home as if it were their own, so hearing that you felt that care in the finished details means everything.

We’re already looking forward to teaming up on the exterior when you’re ready. Until then, enjoy your refreshed spaces and please reach out if you need anything at all—even if it’s just a paint‑color opinion or a quick fix.

Thanks again for the heartfelt words and for making our work so rewarding

Neat Services Inc.

reviews.comment: Very efficient . The front of my house was finished in less than ten days. Im very pleased with the product I chose.  My house looks splendid . My neighbors all comment on how great it looks . My main concern was sealing the front so water won't come though when it rains .

reviewReply.comment:
Thank you so much for sharing this! Knowing that your project wrapped up in under ten days and that the new façade is already turning heads on the block makes our whole crew smile. We chose your materials together with that water‑tight seal in mind, so it’s great to hear you’re feeling confident when the rain rolls in.
If you ever notice anything that doesn’t look or feel right—no matter how small—just give us a call and we’ll be there. In the meantime, enjoy that curb‑appeal glow‑up and all the neighbor compliments that come with it!
Warm regards,
Neat Services Inc.

Neat Services did an expert job at my property in the following areas:
(1) Fixing sheet rock from water damage
(2) Painting 2900 sq feet, with no flaws
(3) Powerwashing the front and the backyard, removing long built up stains/debris
(4) Painting a fence in the backyard to protect it from the elements.

In all, I wasn't at the property, there were renters living there.  Even through I wasn't around the communication was timely and and detailed.  They started the job when they said they would and finished on the timeline they provide.  I would highly recommend them.

They did an excellent job. My basement was an empty and messy room and they transformed into fully finished apartment. The finishing touches are perfect. Their materials were of good quality. They finished the project within the time promised.
They guys are organized, neat and very nice.
They did an amazing job.
Thank you so much!

Neat Services.

reviews.comment:
Neat Construction had excellent follow through, great communication with Diego, clear understanding of the progression of the project. I would highly recommend them. I had no doubt they would make the best choice for me when I could not be there. They are one of the most highly organized companies I have ever dealt with. Well worth working with people who do things right. They had excellent communication– 6 stars! ‘You get what you pay for.’ High quality costs more and is well worth it.”
Angie Blandi
